summary:
Changes the blue under-padding and other materials to a more neutral color of either gray or brown. I found this made the armour blend a bit more visually with non-set items you might want to wear with it.

First skin of mine for this game :D
descriptionHtml:
Changes the blue under-padding and other materials to a more neutral color of either gray or brown. I found this made the armour blend a bit more visually with non-set items you might want to wear with it.

First skin of mine for this game :D

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To install drop the textures folder of your choice into your data folder and you\'re set. To uninstall simply move the blades folder out. (skyrim-data-textures-armor-blades)

The blades shield might need a reskin too, I\'ll see to it if you think so as well. Let me know in comments. 

---------------------------------------------------------------

updated with shield skins to match

also please excuse the lack of screenshot p-zazz, they are what they are.
author: armdude
